text: Tun Ismail bin Mohamed Ali (16 September 1918 â€“ 6 July 1998) was the second Governor of Bank Negara Malaysia. He was also the chairman of Pemodalan Nasional Berhad (PNB). He was the brother of Siti Hasmah Mohamad Ali, the wife of former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. Category:1918 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Malaysian businesspeople
title: Ismail Mohamed Ali
